name: AFGRecipeManager
comment: Handles everything to do with recipes in the game.

methods.name: Get
methods.comment: Get the game phase manager, this should always return something unless you call it really early.

methods.name: Get
methods.comment: Get the game phase manager from a world context, this should always return something unless you call it really early.

methods.name: AddAvailableRecipe
methods.comment:
@todounlock Make private and add schematics manager as a friend
Make a recipe available to the producers.

methods.name: GetAvailableRecipesForProducer
methods.comment: Gets the available recipes for the given class, may not be null.

methods.name: GetAffordableRecipesForProducer
methods.comment: Gets the available and affordable recipes for the given class, may not be null.

methods.name: FindRecipesByIngredient
methods.comment: Find all recipes using the given item as an ingredient.

methods.name: FindRecipesByProduct
methods.comment: Find all recipes having the given item as an product.

methods.name: ResetAllRecipes
methods.comment: Resets recipes to their defaults, also cleans up pre alpha save state.

methods.name: FilterRecipesByProducer
methods.comment: Filters recipes for a given producer.

properties.name: mAvailableRecipes
properties.comment: All recipes that are available to the producers, i.e. build gun, workbench, manufacturers etc.
